name: Trash Dropper
description:
You are a sea turtle going on a swim through a  part of the ocean that is filled with trash that you have to avoid! Use the Arrow keys to move around.

Credits:

Art and Coding: Cloud Studios

Sounds Generated in Leshy Labs SF Maker

Underwater Sound by Mike Koenig on Sound Bible

Made for Seajam in about 2 1/2 days
